These wizards are located in the Watchtower, helping to protect Yanille from ogres.

The wizards also have distinctly different types of robes from most commonly found wizards (including the ones in the Wizards' Tower).

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

The following text is transcluded from Transcript:Wizard (Watchtower).
Standard dialogue
  • Wizard: All's well that ends well.
  • (End of dialogue)
